|brand = Wink |model = Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = WNKHUB-2US |page_start_date = April 22, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Wink_Hub_2 |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ACAJ-WHUB2 |icid = 11938A-WHUB2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;i.MX6UL;MCIMX6G1CVMM05AA |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = ARM926J |cpu1spd = 396 <!-- 350 / 400 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = STMicro;STM32L100; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 32 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;STM32L100;onchip; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 8 KiB |ram2chip = STMicro;STM32L100;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN8720A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:21:CC |oui = B0:72:BF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.04; |stockos = Linux;3.14.52;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, JP5 |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,, unpopulated,, P2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth LE, Z-Wave, ZigBee, Lutron Clear Connect, Kidde |addchip = Z-Wave SoC;Sigma Designs;SD3502A;;1;,,, 128 Kbit SPI Bus EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;M95128;;1;,,, ZigBee SoC (ARM Cortex-M3 32-bit);Silicon Labs;EM3587;;1;,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Energy FEM;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2432L;;1;,,, 8-bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip Technology;PIC16F883;;1;,,, Ultra low power sub-1 GHz RF Transceiver;Texas Instruments;CC110L;;2;,,, 2A, 17V, 340/800kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7250B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/23/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16881679003 |asin = B01KW8WGZQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata LBEH5DU1BW |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43340; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *''[[Murata]]'' LBEH5DU1BW ([http://wireless.murata.com/eng/products/rf-modules-1/wi-fi-bluetooth/type-1bw.html Type 1BW]) - Wi-Fi/Bluetooth/RF Modules :Wi-Fi 802.11abgn, Bluetooth v4.0+EDR, "SS5021042 1BW 2" marked :based on ''[[Cypress]]'' CYW43340 ([[Broadcom]] BCM43340) SDIO/UART
{{see also|Wink Hub}}
